pages.text: $(l)Category:$() Large Sauropod $(br)$(l)Tamable:$() True $(br)$(l)Aggression:$() Neutral $(br)$(l)Type:$() Herd $(br)$(l)Found In:$() Taigas

Journal Page by $(l)HannahPBnJ$() $(br2)The Diplodocus is a large-sized sauropod that can carry up to 3 players when tamed. It can be tamed as a baby with veggies, and switched into Harvesting Mode with Space to harvest tree leaves while riding.
